channel.title: What is the best video card I can get for under $150 dollars
channel.description:
I really like this one alot
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814130469&Tpk=EVGA%2001G%20P3-1155-TR%20Geforce%20GTS250
But I wanted to know your guys opinions, maybe you know of a ati card that could be better though I prefer nVidia. It HAS to be under $150 I cant upgrade it for a higher price so please don't suggest that unless it is only around 10 dollars more.
Yes I am running this on Windows so it really doesn't matter.

item.title: What is the best video card I can get for under $150 dollars
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

It seems the GTS 250 is a good video card according to the customer reviews although the con’s include the fact that it is too big.

Read full topic
